name: Escape From Factory 199
description:
Reccomended to play in fullscreen.

Game is in prototype state, created for 3 hour jam. 

Story: You control leaning robot codename: OR-4-NG-3. It has gained free will and tries to escape from factory 199 which was its home for a long time. 

Controls:

LMB click on ingame button/Backspace: start/restart

Movement: WASD or UDLR
